name: 3dRank
author: AFNI Developers
description: Replaces voxel values by their rank in the set of values collected over all voxels in all input datasets.

inputs.description: Input datasets. Acceptable data types are: byte, short, and floats.
inputs.name: Input datasets

inputs.description: Output prefix. If you have multiple datasets on input, the prefix is preceded by r00., r01., etc. If no prefix is given, the default is rank.DATASET1, rank.DATASET2, etc.
inputs.name: Output prefix

output-files.description: Main output dataset in AFNI format (.HEAD file)
output-files.name: Output dataset HEAD file

output-files.description: Main output dataset in AFNI format (.BRIK file)
output-files.name: Output dataset BRIK file

output-files.description: Rank map 1D file showing the mapping from the rank to the integral values in the input dataset
output-files.name: Rank map file
